thread.title: XiAn LONGi Silicon to invest about 1.5 bln yuan in India's solar project
thread.title_full: BRIEF-XiAn LONGi Silicon to invest about 1.5 bln yuan in India's solar project | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: XiAn LONGi Silicon to invest about 1.5 bln yuan in India's solar project
text:
Sept 24 XiAn LONGi Silicon Materials Corp
* Says plans to invest about 1.5 billion yuan ($235.06 million) in solar cell and components project in India
Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/1QzPOqm
 ($1 = 6.3814 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms)
